title: Branch-based work item creation with human-in-the-loop PR review
description: Enhance work-item-creation-agent and git-ops-agent to support creating work items on a separate branch with automatic PR creation for human review. This creates an intelligent checkpoint where humans can review, consolidate, refine, or reject auto-created items before they enter the master backlog and consume processing cycles.
acceptance_criteria: git-ops-agent supports 'create-items-pr' mode that creates branch, commits, and creates PR
PR includes summary of all items created with links to each
Calling agents can choose sequential (master) or branched (PR) workflows
Documentation updated with branching workflow examples

technical_notes.implementation_approach: Option 2 - Keep work-item-creation-agent simple, enhance git-ops-agent with branching logic
